title: Someone plz help me with rp!
body: I know nobody has a reason to give me rp, but it would mean a lot if you could give me rp I'm bronze 3 i'm not the best but all I'm asking is just some rp. Thank you.

replies.body:
You didn't mention the amount of RP you're looking for. We may be able to work something out if you need a pretty small amount and write a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Ummm probably enough to buy {{champion:120}} or {{champion:119}}  because I got two cool skins for those champs in chest, but really I'm okay with any amount. Also whats the support ticket for don't know what that this is about could you tell me what is about?

If you click the support ticket link I provided above,  you can create a ticket with this request (for RP). Your ticket will be answered by our support specialists. We definitely cannot give you 975 RP, but you can request a lower amount and we'll see what happens. ^.^
Okay well thank you.  I went to the link and did a request what know?
Now your ticket is in our ticket queue and will be picked up by a specialist in the order it was received. Sit tight and we'll get back to you. ^.^
